meanings.definition: The roof of the mouth separating the oral and nasal cavities.
meanings.sent1: The dentist checked my palate for any issues with my teeth.
meanings.sent2: I burned the roof of my mouth on some hot soup, right on my palate.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally sprayed water up my nose, and it came out my palate!
meanings.sent4: Her words hit me hard, like a punch to the palate.
meanings.sent5: The palate is like a bridge between the mouth and the nose, connecting them.

meanings.sent1: The chef's special dish delighted my palate with its flavors.
meanings.sent2: I have a sweet tooth, always craving desserts to satisfy my palate.
meanings.sent3: His palate was so picky, he only liked foods in shades of green!
meanings.sent4: The music was a feast for the ears, a melody that touched the palate of the soul.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting was a masterpiece that appealed to the visual palate of the viewers.
